headline: Dow Jones Futures: AI Disruption Fears Grip Market; Arista, Applied Materials Jump On Earnings Late
summary: The stock market tumbled Thursday, with the S&P 500 below its 50-day line. The AI disruption trade is intensifying. Applied Materials and Arista Networks reported late.

raw.headline: Dow Jones Futures: AI Disruption Fears Grip Market; Arista, Applied Materials Jump On Earnings Late

headline: Arista Networks: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 75 cents per share. The cloud networking company posted revenue of $2.49 billion in the period, also topping Street forecasts. Seven analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $2.37 billion.

raw.headline: Arista Networks: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 75 cents per share. The cloud networking company posted revenue of $2.49 billion in the period, also topping Street forecasts. Seven analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $2.37 billion.

headline: Arista Earnings Top Estimates, Revenue Outlook Above Views

headline: Arista Networks, Inc. Reports Fourth Quarter and Year End 2025 Financial Results
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., February 12, 2026--Arista Networks, Inc. (NYSE: ANET), an industry leader in data-driven, client-to-cloud networking for large AI, data center, campus, and routing environments, today announced financial results for its fourth quarter and the full year ended December 31, 2025.

headline: Cisco Memory Chip Warning Sends Down Dell, HPE, Arista, NetApp Shares
summary: Cisco stock, along with shares in rivals Dell, Arista and HPE fell on Cisco's comments on higher memory chip prices lowering profit margins.

headline: Stocks in OpenAI’s Orbit Get Second Look as Traders Eye Rebound
summary: The erstwhile AI kingmaker has been passed by its rivals, or at least that’s the public perception.  “It is very possible, if not likely, that at some point this year OpenAI will have come out with a new model that’s recaptured the zeitgeist, reversing the perception that it is lagging,” said Brian Barbetta, co-leader of Wellington Management’s technology team and a co-portfolio manager on the global innovation strategy.  The shares of companies tied to OpenAI have come under heavy pressure in recent months.

The shares of companies tied to OpenAI have come under heavy pressure in recent months.

headline: Rosenblatt Raises Price Target For Arista Networks (ANET)
summary: Arista Networks (NYSE:ANET) is one of the 11 best communication equipment stocks according to hedge funds. On February 10, Michael Genovese from Rosenblatt raised his price target for Arista Networks (NYSE:ANET) from $140 to $165. He reaffirmed his Neutral rating on the stock, which now offers a 20% upside potential at the prevailing level. Genovese’s […]
